020import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Dialect;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.StandardSQL;
022
023/**
024 * H2
025 *
026 * @author creatorfromhell
027 * @since 1.0.0.2-SNAPSHOT-20
028 */
029public class H2 extends StandardSQL {
030
031  public H2(final Dialect dialect) {
032    super(dialect);
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * The name of this engine.
037   *
038   * @return The engine name.
039   */
040  @Override
041  public String name() {
042    return "h2";
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public String[] driver() {
047    return new String[] {
048            "org.h2.Driver"
049    };
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public String[] dataSource() {
054    return new String[] {
055            "org.h2.jdbcx.JdbcDataSource"
056    };
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public String url(final String file, final String host, final int port, final String database) {
061    return "jdbc:h2:file:" + file + ";mode=MySQL;DB_CLOSE_ON_EXIT=TRUE;FILE_LOCK=NO";
062  }
063}
